item.title: Paula add a quote by Dean Koontz
item.description: "Hunches [are] just messages from the subconscious, which [is] thinking furiously all the time and processing information we have not consciously noted." -- Dean Koontz

item.title: Paula add a quote by Dean Koontz
item.description: "His blue eyes were seas where sorrow sailed." -- Dean Koontz

item.title: Paula add a quote by Dean Koontz
item.description: "A short-order cook, just off work, makes easy tracking for lions and worse" -- Dean Koontz

item.title: Paula add a quote by Harlan Coben
Paula add a quote by Harlan Coben
item.description: "Years fly by, but the heart stays in the same place." -- Harlan Coben
